channel.title: Need Help Please {64 Bit OS}
channel.description:
[code] The system cannot find the path specified. `"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin"` is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. [/code]
and my Run Client is like this: [code] @echo off cd Source "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin" -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme Gui @echo on [/code]

item.title: Need Help Please {64 Bit OS}
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

The system cannot find the path specified.
`"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin"` is not recognized as an internal or external
command, operable program or batch file.

and my Run Client is like this:

@echo off
cd Source
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin" -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme Gui
@echo on

Read full topic
